Articles.Content:
Welcome to the new and improved Shiny Industries!

I decided to make a new thread after I realized I couldn't edit the title of the old one. I also needed to make posts right after my OP for more planes due to the 5 image limit. All creations are stock besides the tank, which requires Jellycube's railgun mod and Damned Robotics.

-All-Purpose Jets-

An all-purpose low altitude jet. Modeled after the F-35 Lightning.

Note: Don't press space twice - I used hardpoints for some of the finder details of the plane.

An all-purpose high altitude jet. Don't turn too fast. Inspired by the VTOL in Kerbals at War.

Edited August 12, 2012 by Shiny

-Bombers-

A nice, large, stable bomber for all your bombing needs! Bombs not included.

2nd generation bomber that takes off fast and has a large payload and range. Fairly stable.

Edited August 19, 2012 by Shiny

-SSTO Craft-

Capable of reaching a low-kerbin orbit with enough fuel to re-land.

Edit: I also forgot to retract landing gear. Every single time.

A large frigate-class starship. Entirely stock. Mechjeb is optional - stick the case version on the cockpit, set the turn start to above 40k and the turn end to above 100k. This is a VAB craft.

Edited August 14, 2012 by Shiny

-Tanks and Turrets-

Packs a large punch. Requires Jellycube's railgun mod and damned robotics.

But... But... They're not shiny! ;(

In all seriousness, those are some pretty damn good planes and what not. Well done. This is what I say to anything I see posted here in the exchange, because anything here looks amazing compared to my... semi successful attempts.

Edited August 13, 2012 by Panichio
How do you make the tank turret?
Thanks for the replies guys! I made the tank turret by attaching a powered hinge to a rotationtronthingy, and attaching that to the two railguns. Or something like that.
Wow I am an idiot I have been attaching the turret armor to the hinge and the railguns to the armor in which case only moved 2 of the pieces connected to the tank armor.
too bad its a bitch to add stuff to the sides of the Laser mod we have, otherwise I would have recommended using that instead of railguns, but otherwise, these look awesome!

If you're talking about the sunbeam laser mod, yeah, I wish I could use the auto-aim of the laser. I tried editing the cfg to allow part attachment onto the laser itself, but when I aimed the laser, the model moved without the stuff attached to the model moving.

Added a much larger, frigate class SSTO. I'm still thinking of a catchy name, so I'll just call it the "F-02 Frigate" for now. This is a VAB design, so don't put it in the SPH.

Heavily inspired by 42i and kerby1883.

Edit: It won't let me post another attachment? I guess the limit is 5 for now. The .craft will be on the SSTO post, not the OP.

Edited August 14, 2012 by Shiny
ANyone got a working like to jellycube's railgun, a search turned nothing up .

ANyone got a working like to jellycube's railgun, a search turned nothing up .

Look in the addons section, it shouldn't be too hard to find.

Oh, and I just remembered that back when they worked, Yoriks Particle Cannons could be mounted on the side of a Railgun. Too bad the PPC's no longer work though...
New bomber! Updated OP with the new plane.
okay ive mododified one of your bombers so it can bomb link there im a -new poster-

Here the picture tank http://s1163.photobucket.com/albums/q545/JiangRicky/

Edited August 21, 2012 by ricky jiang
Did the t-2 swift play a role in Kerbal at war because it it is like one of those craft?
